function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential inefficacy of UVGI technology in disinfecting indoor air and surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of UVGI systems, along with the use of complementary disinfection methods","Technologies":"Regular UVGI system maintenance, use of complementary disinfection methods","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, and visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, healthcare facility administrators"},{"Description":"Limited effectiveness of in-duct UVGI systems due to ventilation system efficiency and fan capacity","Impact":"Reduced ability to disinfect air and prevent the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Upgrading ventilation systems and fans, using in-duct UVGI as a supplement to other HVAC interventions","Technologies":"Ventilation system upgrades, fan capacity improvements","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, HVAC technicians","Owner":"Facility managers, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Diminished ability of UVGI to disinfect indoor surfaces in the presence of dirt and debris","Impact":"Increased risk of surface transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning of indoor surfaces, removal of dirt and debris before UVGI disinfection","Technologies":"Regular cleaning procedures, dirt and debris removal methods","People":"Cleaning staff, facility maintenance personnel","Owner":"Facility managers"}]}
